About me

My name is Edvard

I am 30 years old and I am from Belarus. Now I live in Poland. I am working in digital mapping now. As an engineer by education, I am interested in the technical part of working with modern technologies. Specifically, I study web technologies. To date, I already have results in this direction. You can evaluate them by following the portfolio links on this page.
Web development
I am develop websites. At the request of the customer, these can be both landing pages and multi-page websites.
Application Development
I develop desktop web applications, adapting them to mobile devices
GIS technologies
Working with GIS technologies. I create maps and 3D terrain models, work with interactive maps in browsers (OSM and others)

Experience

How can I be useful

Education

  • Belarusian State University

    Bachelor | Minsk (2010 - 2015)
    Graduated from the university with a degree in geological engineering. Worked in the specialty for 6 years

  • RS School

    JavaScript preschool (2022)
    Studied Javascript, including many libraries (JQuery, etc.), Webpack, Git and much more

  • Udemy

    Web-development courses (2022)
    Studied HTML, CSS, JavaScript basics, working with preprocessors and project builders (Gulp, Webpack)

Work experience

  • Geological engineer

    Minsk (2015 - 2021)
    Study of soil mechanics at the base of high-rise structures and buildings with increased loads. Including worked in the salt mines of Soligorsk

  • GIS-specialist

    LYFT | Minsk (2021 - 2022)
    I am engaged in the development of interactive maps in browsers (mainly based on OSM), databases and queries to them. We are working on improving the quality of navigation for taxis in the US and Canada

Skills

What do I use at work
HTML5
It is he who creates the frame of your site or application, and the fifth version will allow me to create a more SEO-optimized structure of your product
CSS3
This style language allows me to create absolutely any look for your site or application. Everything is limited only by your imagination!
Java Script
This programming language allows you to bring anything to life: sliders, windows, tooltips, tabs, receiving data from the server, and much more.
Jquery
The Jquery library will speed up development. Without the need to integrate it into the project, we will not, but the skill of working with it is present
Figma
It is figma that allows designers to create wonderful concepts, and allows web developers to implement them without much effort.
Webpack
Webpack collects our projects in one heap, greatly facilitating the work of the developer. Saves time and therefore money
